name: Advanced Security
description: WebWaka Digital Operating System - Advanced Security Agent (Agent 34) Enterprise-Grade Security Enhancement with Multi-Layer Encryption and Threat Detection  This agent provides comprehensive security monitoring, multi-layer encryption, threat detection, intrusion prevention, and advanced security analytics optimized for African infrastructure and Ubuntu philosophy integration.
